title: Rito why you kill our poros
body:
I haven't played league for 2 or 3 months. Now I have come back and aram is this new ugly map. I didn't mind at first but when I heard that it's going to be permanent I was upset. 

1. No more poros. Only creepy little purple tadpoles. No way am I giving my poro snack to those nasty things. 2. I miss the old shopkeepers. It feels like they've died and been replaced. 

I'm just sad and I miss my favourite map. Is anyone else experiencing similar feelings of _pls rito give us back snow bridge_?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Faithful Puppy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6IjJXpKu,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-31T13:43:43.091+0000)
>
> I haven't played league for 2 or 3 months. Now I have come back and aram is this new ugly map. I didn't mind at first but when I heard that it's going to be permanent I was upset. 
> 
> 1. No more poros. Only creepy little purple tadpoles. No way am I giving my poro snack to those nasty things. 2. I miss the old shopkeepers. It feels like they've died and been replaced. 
> 
> I'm just sad and I miss my favourite map. Is anyone else experiencing similar feelings of _pls rito give us back snow bridge_?

Howling Abyss will be back you misinformed person.
I'm glad to hear it. The people in my game seemed pretty sure about it, so I'm glad they were wrong....  or maybe pulling my leg ;)
I'm 20 and I don't see how my age is relevant to this discussion.

What you can do is make a custom game call it "ARAM Howling Abyss" and set it up to be just like a normal ARAM game.

I personally would like it if they mixed them both since it would be a waste not to use them!

poros are overrated.
they're the minions of league at this point.
wait till christmas. do some productive shit for nezt 6 months and cm back
